players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who the mafioso is among us three remaining players."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice, we need to find the mafioso among us. Based on my investigation last night, I believe Alice is the one who committed the crime."
Bob: "I find it odd that Charlie accused Alice of the crime so quickly, without any solid evidence. Let's focus on gathering more information before jumping to conclusions."
Bob: "Let's not jump to conclusions based on speculation. We need solid evidence before accusing anyone. I believe we should all focus on gathering more information during the night."
